long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows you if you have previously visited the URL in the current tab. Displays the number of previous visits on the action icon, and displays the dates of 50 last visits when clicking the icon.

If you sometimes visit a website, and you're not sure if you've previously visited it, but want to know, then this is the extension for you.

It works by querying the browser's built-in history API - which means that if you have cleared your browsing history, it will not appear in this extension either.

I plan to also add a search option, but otherwise the extension is meant to remain simple and minimal.
